title: Teacher Professional Development Training Program Based on Integrated Learning Design Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental ICT utilization skills and basic concepts of instructional design
context.additional_context: A program enhancing collaborative learning and ICT integration skills through project-based assessment in a smartphone-based, technology-constrained environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design a science-integrated collaborative learning scenario in three stages (planning-design-implementation) using the ILDE (Integrated Learning Design Environment) tool.
Learners can proficiently utilize core features of the learning design tool (template application, activity sequencing, resource integration) in a mobile environment with over 80% mastery.
Learners can apply their designed learning scenarios to small student groups (1â€“10 participants) to produce and evaluate project outcomes.

resources: Science Curriculum-Aligned Open Educational Resources (OER) Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
